AdultRole.Description: Adult role to grow into when aged ChildToAdultTimeRange. Instructions disabled if not provided.

ChildToAdultTimeRange.Description: Age period where the role change to AdultRole will happen.

GrowUpParticles.Description: The particle name to spawn when an entity grows up.

GrowUpParticlesOffset.Description: Offset for GrowUpParticles, useful when models have different sizes.

GrowUpSound.Description: Sound made when an entity grows up.

Content.$Comment: Handles the growing up and role change of the calf into its parent entity role.
